thread.title: Moore Aid 2015 has been cancelled
thread.title_full: Moore Aid 2015 has been cancelled | afr.com

author: Will Glasgow
title: Moore Aid 2015 has been cancelled
text:
Moore Aid 2015 has been cancelled indefinitely. Louise Kennerley Share on twitter Share on Google Plus by Will Glasgow Macquarie Group slipped out the news after Friday's close that its chief donut Nicholas Moore missed out on performance shares worth $1.6 million. He failed to clear hurdles set in 2011 and 2012.
We were just about to ask Bob Geldof and Greg Hywood if we couldn't organise some sort of Fairfax-led appeal to help Moore out â€“ but then we caught the rest of the notice. Turns out he still has a pile of over $133 million Macquarie shares with loads more in train.
Let's hold off on Moore Aid 2015 for now.
